Parameters.Name: ADVANCED_SECURITY-5-1-2 Advanced Security Service Capabilities
Parameters.Description: To verify >Advanced Security Service Capabilities of the DUT

Test.Name: PasswordBasedEncryptionAlgorithms: Correct response (one item in the list)
PasswordBasedEncryptionAlgorithms: Correct response (several items in the list)
PasswordBasedEncryptionAlgorithms: Correct response (several items in the list, different order)
PasswordBasedEncryptionAlgorithms: invalid response (different items, different count)
PasswordBasedEncryptionAlgorithms: invalid response (empty list in GetServiceCapabilities)
PasswordBasedEncryptionAlgorithms: invalid response (empty list in GetServices)
PasswordBasedMACAlgorithms: Correct response (one item in the list)
PasswordBasedMACAlgorithms: Correct response (several items in the list)
PasswordBasedMACAlgorithms: Correct response (several items in the list, different order)
PasswordBasedMACAlgorithms: invalid response (different items, different count)
PasswordBasedMACAlgorithms: invalid response (empty list in GetServiceCapabilities)
PasswordBasedMACAlgorithms: invalid response (empty list in GetServices)
Dot1XMethods: Correct response (different order of Dot1XMethods elements)
Dot1XMethods: Correct response (different order of Dot1XMethods lists)
